name: The VR Sickness Lab
description:
Welcome To the VR Sickness Lab

Use caution when playing this project! This can definitely cause motion/VR sickness. 

This project explores some of the bad practices that should be avoided when developing for VR. In the project, users will be able to activate different features that have been known to induce VR sickness. This game allows developers to experience what should normally be avoided so they can better understand what to avoid when developing their own game.

The game itself is a obstacle course that the player can run through and get to the end.

Some of the features included

  •  Low FPS simulator
  •  Bumper Balls (Add impact to player on contact)
  •  Fast Move Speed
  •  Move Horizon
  •  Zoom in on Move

Check out my blog
